post:
The final blowout for the end of the sale holiday, these will not be repeated and quantities are highly limited!

_All servers below are **NAT IPv4** + IPv6 enabled._

**All servers come with:**

* 1 vCPU (See FUP in terms)
* 256 MB RAM
* 5GB HDD
* 500 GB BW

<hr/>

**EUROPE**

* Bulgaria
* Norway
* Germany
* France
* Italy

That is **5** VPS for just $15 in **TOTAL** for a whole **YEAR**!
Order Link:  https://clients.mrvm.net/cart.php?a=add&bid=17

<hr/>

**USA**

* New York
* West Virginia 
* Kansas City
* Lenoir 
* Las Vegas

That is **5** VPS for just $15 in **TOTAL** for a whole **YEAR**!
Order Link:  https://clients.mrvm.net/cart.php?a=add&bid=18

<hr/>

**ASIA Pacific**

* Sydney
* Perth
* Singapore


That is **3** VPS for just $9 in **TOTAL** for a whole **YEAR**!
Order Link:  https://clients.mrvm.net/cart.php?a=add&bid=19


<hr/>

IMPORTANT: These are specific to the 2019 Black Friday, they will not be repeated, due to the ridiculously low pricing I am unable to entertain any change or variation under any circumstances, asking simply hurts my ability to be able to bring offers like this to the community. I appreciate your understanding.

It should go without saying but just in case, these are none refundable.

<hr/>

**Features:**

* All locations have HAproxy front ends fully automated so you can host your site including https 
* Tun/TAP available
* Fuse available
* NFS available
* All **IPv4 are NAT**
* You get 20 ports forwarded + 1 special port for ssh access over IPv4
* All locations come with a routed IPv6 subnet
* You will get access to the Virtualizor control panel for server management.
* Bandwidth resets monthly

<hr/>

**Common uses are:**

* Teamspeak Servers
* VPN Servers
* Proxy Servers
* Web Servers
* Distributed database master<>master/slave setups
* Scrapers 
* Cheap HA using Cloudflare and round-robin DNS
* IRC clients (IPv6 only)

<hr/>

**Simple terms overview:**

* No torrenting
* No tor
* NO TOR
* TOR is not allowed!
* No crypto mining/wallets
* No bulk mailing
* No IRC Servers
